bio: I am a passionate software developer from Brazil with over 10 years of experience. During this time, I found that my real drive lies in building products by creating apps with great visuals, high-quality code base and amazing user experience. This also means helping to create and maintain a solid product vision.
check_out_resume: You can check out my resume
p4p_description_1: Postcards for Parents' mission is to help parents navigate the tricky waters of their daily responsabilities by synthesizing findings from multiple areas of psychology into easily digestible postcards.
p4p_description_2: This project was very different from the other ones because I had to rebuild their whole platform, which was originally built entirely in Laravel.
p4p_description_3: I ported the whole front end to React and the back end was rebuilt, still in Laravel, to work as an API.
hatch_description_1: Hatch is a platform that helps people start working together in just a few minutes. Using this app you can create a contract, track time and get paid.
hatch_description_2: This project was a real pleasure to work in especially because I had the opportunity to be involved with it since the very early stages. Coming up with ideas, running rounds of interviews and usability testings, all to craft the best experience possible for clients.
hatch_description_3: Another thing I was able to do while working on this project was learning new skills, like React and React Native (Expo). I really enjoy the process of learning a new technology and building something meaningful with it.
turtle_description_1: Turtle is a project management platform where people can create contracts, track time, get paid, create workspaces, tasks and much more.
turtle_description_2: It is composed of two projects:
turtle_description_2_1: Front office: built using Flutter and lets users manage their workspaces and talk to team members
turtle_description_2_2: Back office: built using React and lets users perform administrative tasks like create contracts
turtle_description_3: When I joined Turtle, the project was already in production, but I was responsible for multiple fixes, optimizations and new features for both projects.
activite_description_1: Activite Personal is a companion app for Personal Trainers to help with their daily routine by allowing them to create fitness assessments of their clients. Its final version was built using Flutter, supporting both Android and iOS, but is was orignally built using native Android (Java/Kotlin).
activite_description_2: I'm really proud of the work I did on this project, especially because I was able to work on everything related to it: the app itself, API, UX, design, website and marketing.
activite_description_3: Unfortunately it was discontinued in late 2022.
contact_form_1: Got any questions, a proposal or only want to say hi?
